snippet.title: Chocolate Factory - Official Announcement Trailer
snippet.description: Check out the announcement trailer for Chocolate Factory, an upcoming first-person factory automation game featuring a little exploration and combat. Chocolate Factory will be available on PC in June 2024. Build your dream Chocolate Factory among candy cane forests and gumdrop hills to produce the tastiest sweets.
